html:
10.16.17  9:01 pm   should i marry a squid or an octopus?

     sure

10.16.17  8:59 pm   how do i get grass happy

     you just have to trust that the grass will find happiness on its own

10.16.17  8:57 pm   hi, do you ever just feel like... AAAAAAAHHHHHHHH?

     yes

10.16.17  8:56 pm   Can you make a full version of what steve is singin?

     the full version of the music from the steve video is contained in the steve video

10.16.17  8:53 pm   10.14.17  4:11 pm Will you add litecoin too? Pretty plz :)

     sure. i will be more likely to add it sooner if you send me an email explaining how to do it

10.16.17  8:49 pm   Call me Ishmael.

     ok

10.16.17  8:25 pm   Will I ever find someone to love?

     i think so

10.16.17  8:14 pm   how did you pass precalc

     i did not

10.16.17  7:56 pm   Do you have any more tips about soap to expand upon the video that you have made?

     not at this time

10.16.17  7:26 pm   when someone gives you directions and says "it's four doors down on your right," does that mean you go in the fourth door, or is it the door after four doors (the fifth one)?

     4th door

10.16.17  7:09 pm   How much money would I have to pay you to go on youtube, watch hoj and hotewig and read all the comments?

     i'm not sure if it would be physically possible to read all the comments in my lifetime

10.16.17  7:06 pm   Why can't google maps give me directions to saturn?

     because there is currently no way for you to get to saturn

10.16.17  7:06 pm   how do i come out as gay to my parents and friends

     i don't think it really matters that much

10.16.17  6:30 pm   Have you gotten offers to appear on tv talk shows?

     yes

10.16.17  5:46 pm   which do you like better, making songs, or making videos?

     i hope i am allowed to do both together

10.16.17  5:45 pm   how to mak babie part 2

     trying to explain to the baby what the hell is going on in the world they now live in

10.16.17  4:41 pm   the millennial marketers and the Introvert marketers are fighting over who can target me, with ads. what can i do?

     buy both products

10.16.17  4:40 pm   you think you could do a pizza themed video next?

     no

      or eventually?

     i've already done one

10.16.17  4:25 pm   how would you define "creative",

     able to evade definitions

     and would you consider yourself creative? 

     i'm doing the best i can

10.16.17  3:58 pm   What are the 'WJAZ' chords from the nightfly?

     Emin7, D6, Emin7/D, F6

10.16.17  1:25 pm   What makes a person beautiful?

     you never know

10.16.17  12:57 pm   If I get a music idea (like a little melody or something) that I really like, but I forget how it goes by the time I get home... will it eventually just pop back in my head, or is it gone forever?

     you need to write down new ideas immediately. new ideas are the most forgettable, because you've never heard them before. it will vanish as soon as you hear another song. there is no guarantee that it will come back to you, and if it does, you will never be certain if it's the same. you need to catch them immediately, if you take yourself seriously

10.16.17  11:55 am   what is the 27th note of your new song

     G

10.16.17  11:45 am   how to mak babie

     ah, thanks george, for your question. i'm excited to tell you, and the studio audience, that anyone can make babies in the comfort of their own home. and i know you are thinking, "but jeff, how is this possible?" but hold on to your hats, we'll tackle this and more in just a few minutes. stay tuned

10.16.17  11:24 am   is the dolphin in outside related to the dolphin in funny dolphin?

     no

     if they're not related, are they dating??

     no

     or maybe business partners???

     no

10.16.17  9:23 am   Do we actually exist 

     sure

10.16.17  8:46 am   Can I ever be loved?

     yes

10.16.17  4:01 am   do you think the sun has feelings?

     it is feelings

      and when people say "ugh i hate the sun" do its feelings get hurt?

     i don't think the sun speaks english nor can it hear what people say on earth

     i cant sleep because i want the sun to be happy and protected 

     it is

10.16.17  3:12 am   Am I allowed to ask questions on here?

     i will check with the rules and regulations

10.16.17  1:45 am   Are your songs copyighted in any way?

     oh hell yeah

10.16.17  1:36 am   How many song ideas do you usually get per 2 weeks? I am concerned that you had 395 song ideas after hotewig and after making 5 songs(about 23  or 22 weeks) you have got about 425(according to my calculations it would be an idea per less than a week). I hope you will find a way to finish all these songs!

     those are all the ideas i've had since 2009. i have not done a new writing session since last march, when i generated about 7-10 ideas. otherwise since then there may have been one or two here and there, usually from dreams

10.16.17  12:50 am   Make pizza

     i will do it when i get a chance

10.16.17  12:36 am   I can stick a whole deck of cards in my mouth.

     oh nice

10.16.17  12:27 am   am i important? 

     yes

10.16.17  12:27 am   Would you consider tacos to be a type of cat?

     probably not

10.16.17  12:16 am   What prompted you to make the corrections to "history of japan?" 

     the mistakes i had made

10.16.17  12:13 am   is the questions page limited to just questions? could people just "comment" or say something to you

     you'll have to try and see

10.15.17  11:35 pm   Does humanity have the responsibility to be human?

     they probably can't help it

     or is it OK?

     sure

10.15.17  11:15 pm   Do you enjoy tricking people?

     only if they enjoy it

10.15.17  10:41 pm   10.12.17  9:16 pm i have lost all respect for you

     ah well, if using computers to enjoy the written word is not something you respect, then perhaps i may lose respect for you

10.15.17  10:26 pm   What day of the week will October 15th be in the year 999trillion AD? 

     none

10.15.17  10:22 pm   are your notebook entries/tweets random thoughts that come into your head

     no

10.15.17  10:20 pm   Do you feel like we've created a society immune to natural selection?

     no

10.15.17  10:10 pm   Do you still have a bad car?

     it's worse

     Do you want a better one?

     yes

10.15.17  10:07 pm   do you have a girl?

     i think one may have me, but i can't be sure

10.15.17  9:54 pm   will humans ever evolve

     yes, they've been doing it for quite some time

10.15.17  9:52 pm   do you have a spotify

      i'm on spotify as an artist, but not as a listener

10.15.17  9:41 pm   is there a parallel universe in which parallel universes don't exist?

     any kind of universe can be. not sure why the word parallel comes into the picture so often in these discussions

10.15.17  8:58 pm   have you actually been to Alabama, oh yesss

     yes

10.15.17  8:06 pm   are you an atheist, agnostic, or religious?

     no
